website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality measuring wheel that's easy to maneuver and provides precise readings, but that kind of quality comes at a high cost.
pros: Sturdy wheel that holds up well to a lot of use
cons: This measuring wheel may be more expensive than some users are willing to spend

customer_reviews.title: Two stars given instead of one because the wheel was fantastic before the failure
customer_reviews.text: Wheel failed at the hinge after about 10 uses, owned less than 1 year. The inside cable has also frayed as a result. Only used on flat roof systems, no rough terrain. Two stars given instead of one because the wheel was fantastic before the failure. I've e-mailed the company at custcare@calculated.com as it is still under warranty. If the company replaces the wheel under warranty, I will update this product rating accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Van Rees

customer_reviews.title: I am a Realtor in NH and planned on using ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a Realtor in NH and planned on using this to measure road frontage on land lots. However, when I received the package, it didn't work at all. Upon further inspection, someone had taken it apart to obviously repair it. They over tightened the screw holding the wheel in place on the spindle, and crushed the bushing. I had to go out and purchase one locally because I needed it the next morning. I was able to one at Lowe's for the same money brand new
customer_reviews.author: above_tree_line

customer_reviews.title: Great Wheel. DOES NOT LAST LONG
customer_reviews.text: These are our favorite wheels with the hand brake and the reset up top. BUT We are lucky to get a year out of them. This is the 3rd one we have used now and it seems just shy of a year the gears, or whatever does the measuring, skips, gets hung up. Really not ok when you are laying out a striping job for a brand new parking lot. If you get incorrect spacing the painted lines look HORRIBLE. Would like to recommend, but after 3 wheels in under 2 1/2 years, Id say it time to try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: TXFAM

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Lufkin I been using..
customer_reviews.text: I use a wheel daily on my engineering jobs and I like this one better than any I've used...(only been doing this job 5 months) My only question will be longevity...if it fails, I'll be back with that update. So far, I like it, a lot!
customer_reviews.author: jetheridge

customer_reviews.title: He has been very pleased with this one
customer_reviews.text: I bought “Calculated Industries 6540 Wheel Master Pro 12 Commercial Grade Feet-Inch Distance Measuring Wheel plus the free Carrying Pack for my husband. He uses one in his work weekly. The last one had broken so this is the one he chose. He has been very pleased with this one, stating that it should get 5 Stars rating. I thought perhaps it was because of the carrying case which his old one did not have. He thought that was nice but did not influence his rating. His rating is based on the following: this one works easily, accurately on the job and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: pw reader

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic parts on the shaft and snapped right in half and I have only used this thing a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Charles K.

customer_reviews.title: Very user friendly
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great easy to use product. Seems to be well built and I love the folding feature. I have not checked it against a tape to test it’s accuracy but I rarely use a wheel for a final measurement anyway. I always tape everything for placing final dimensions. I use wheels for estimates and ballpark figures due to all the variables involved. This is perfect for that
customer_reviews.author: Custom man

customer_reviews.title: Good quality wheel
customer_reviews.text: Good quality wheel. This is the 2nd one purchased to keep in another truck. Wheels are used in or landscape business almost daily. The brake is handy for holding a measurement and the handle mounted reset is a real time-saver. When done, fold it, and stick it in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Broke in Less than a Month
customer_reviews.text: Well shoot. It broke where it folds. Using massive amount of duct tape to keep it going for as long as possible. Will not buy again. Cheap thin plastic doesn't hold up under normal use like other brands I've used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: J. Small

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it on a daily basis for 20-30 Houses. Seems to be holding up great. Except, and this is why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. The handle is made of some kind of rubber, and with usage it seems to be deteriorating. In other words the rubber is peeling almost. Besides that The Wheel is pretty sturdy, the kickstand is great it seems to be pretty solid. Its not as heavy as my last wheel. Would Definitely recommend if you can spare the extra Money.
customer_reviews.author: LEgo dad

customer_reviews.title: A good instrument with a handle design problem
customer_reviews.text: A good solid instrument. It works well and is quite accurate. The handle design with the meter brake and reset buttons cause problems. The turned down end of the handle causes you to hold further up, this causes you to sometimes press the reset or brake either one effecting readings while moving.
customer_reviews.author: Dnewt

customer_reviews.title: Maybe mine failed and yours will be fine but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.text: The counter started skipping after just a few miles. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Better then anything else I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I'm a drainage contractor. I get in some really rough conditions at times. Today I was on a job site that I'll be installing a new 18" main. I was feeling lazy, so I ran my Polaris Ranger with this by my side. In the past I have broken measuring wheels doing this. I had absolutely no trouble with this unit. The handle is made for any rugged terrain I've thrown at it. Price was spot on for what I wanted. I'm very pleased with what I have seen from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Wellman

customer_reviews.title: Works well, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Have only used once, but it sure seems to work well. Overall seems to be a good quality item
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & very high-quality
customer_reviews.text: I really impressed the county when I came out with my professional measure. They had a little one and mine was super nice and super accurate and they used mine for their measurement. It worked easily. It’s superior construction and quality. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Florida

customer_reviews.title: I like the fold up handle and carry strap
customer_reviews.text: I use the WheeI Master daily. I like the fold up handle and carry strap. After 2 months of 5 day a week usage the rubber carry strap broke where it is screwed into the frame It is now very hard to carry. The meter is hard to read in bright sunlight and it tends to ratchet frenqyently.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: love the thumb reset and the kickstand! the hinge and lock seem to be well made and clicks together with ease and a solid sound. the unit is a bit heavy and my wrist feels it as the end of using it for hours. aside from needing a large wheel, i chose this one for the included backpack. while i like the wheel, the included backpack falls short in usability as it fits the wheel and not much else. buy the wheel, for the wheel, and get a real back pack that fits it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: The reset trigger is poor
customer_reviews.text: I need a wheel for work. This had the best ratings. The trigger reset is a stiff and it is fairly common that I believe that I have reset the counter, walked down the road and realized that I need to start over.
customer_reviews.author: Almost Southern

customer_reviews.title: Taking full measure
customer_reviews.text: I have used this Wheel Master only slightly since receiving it. It appears to be well made, and quite adequate for my application (I am laying out a small subdivision.) It works as advertised, with the "kick stand" feature being particularly useful. I also find the reset button on the hand grip easier than bending down to reset the reader on the axel. As I am not a heavy user of this tool, I cannot address the durability of its construction over many months and years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Pince

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Seems fairly sturdy. For me it gets light use so I can't vouch for its toughness. With care I think it will do fine for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Fanatic Buyer

customer_reviews.title: User freindly
customer_reviews.text: I use the wheel to measure storm damages and such for FEMA and this is one of the better wheels I have used. I like the way it folds for easier carring and the kick stand is a big plus. The best part is that I can keep a few other measuring tools in the bag with the wheel and it is my measuring tool kit.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Aughenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: This is probably the best wheel I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I use this tool everyday in my work and have used measuring wheels for many, many years. This is probably the best wheel I've ever used. I like the carry handle and how it folds to store in my car trunk. The reset button on the handle is also great. I would recommend this wheel and will buy another when this one wears out, or I wear out. Ha..
customer_reviews.author: Field engineer/inspector

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all projects
customer_reviews.text: It's in feet which is nice and seems very sturdy compared to the the ones I have used for commercial purposes. I needed one since I am starting projects around the house and need sq feet/ distance to get the right ammount of material.
customer_reviews.author: jason.ardans

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use And Great Brake System
customer_reviews.text: I will be using this daily! My husband has one and I needed one too!
customer_reviews.author: J. Byers

customer_reviews.title: kickstand issues
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this wheel. Metal tabs that hold kickstand at an angle bend back causing kickstand to not overextend, and therefore, not provide proper support. Counter sometimes gets stuck with mid-numbers, can't tell if it's a 3 or a 4. Will contact manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: J_Man

customer_reviews.title: Purchaed January 12th and it quit working March 12th.
customer_reviews.text: Purchaed January 12th and it quit working March 12th. Amazon will not replace and there is no information how to get it repaired
customer_reviews.author: B. Rolen

customer_reviews.title: off with inches.
customer_reviews.text: Had correct dimensions first time used. Now the second and third time it's off calculations. Sending it back, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Julie S.

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and the bag is a nice addition
customer_reviews.text: We install cabling and needed a wheel measure for calculating distances so we picked this guy up to keep in one of our installer vans. It's very accurate, easy to use and the bag is a nice addition, makes storing the unit very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Harvanek

customer_reviews.title: and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Unit is well made, works well, and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C.

customer_reviews.title: Great overall
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this meter. Ive been using this everyday for fielding for 3 months now and i have yet to have an issue with mine or something i dislike about it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best wheel used by my real estate appraiser husband and son
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time Saver!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, bag is a good choice to include with it. works and is accurate use it all the time for fencing. Think the price is a tad high.Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley J. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best one for most jobs
customer_reviews.text: This has what you want for nearly all types of areas to measure with remote reset & Wheel lock, start/stop arrow, big wheel for rough spots or grass, kick stand that works & it folds into a compact bag that is included.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES VANBIBBER

customer_reviews.title: Don't like it
customer_reviews.text: I used it for 2 days the first day did not use it very much the 2nd day when I really needed it it failed it would stop counting after 5-10 feet and restart did it numerous times
customer_reviews.author: Joe D Castellano

customer_reviews.title: Easily stored in my vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be well made although not used in an actual appraisal assignment as of yet. Easily stored in my vehicle. The large wheel makes it easy to move over rough surfaces which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Johny J

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Saves me a lot of time. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Rick McBroom

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised. It is very handy compared to a 300 ft. tape. very easy to use. Has held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice features with the reset from the handle grip, love the carry case back pack that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: candy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent measuring wheel for estimators
customer_reviews.text: Field measurements are part of my job and this is the best wheel out of the 4 that I have owned. It is compact, easy to read, accurate, and well built. A must buy for any field measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we need for the field visits done by our inspectors.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Description of product was accurate. Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great measuring wheel
customer_reviews.text: Really great measuring wheel. I used it to measure a couple of city blocks to figure out the best way to align cars for a downtown car show.
customer_reviews.author: J Bell

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Use weekly now for several months. Works great. We'll see is it lasts for a year as that's my expectations. The other wheels I bought had something break before the year was up. Don't use the case
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t measure accurately
customer_reviews.text: Does not measure accurately. Off by 3 to 5 feet per 100. Kinda defeats its purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: More than measures up
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product better then the Rol-tape wheel it replaces. Remote (in-handle) reset is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: WWE

customer_reviews.title: Like the way that it telescopes up and down for ...
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a well made product for the money. Like the way that it telescopes up and down for easy storage and transportation.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Teachout

customer_reviews.title: ... to use in accident reconstructions and he is very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this to use in accident reconstructions and he is very satisfied with it, he said it was the easiest that he has ever used
customer_reviews.author: datcat

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: Feel very high quality has brake kick stand folds reset dial on pistol grip handle nice bag runs smooth
customer_reviews.author: Catalyst663

customer_reviews.title: Best of bunch?
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly the way it should. Easy to use, easy to read and accurate. A tad expensive but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: RCripps

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to measure out distances on my Ranch... Well made and very simple to use comes with carry back pack !!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Won't measure over 100 feet, worked for awhile....a few months, now when it gets to 100 feet it starts locking up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best wheel I have ever had. Everything is thought out well and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jwhite96

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for use by fire inspectors and was exactly what was needed for a backup measuring wheel. The bag that is included with the wheel is great for taking the wheel to different locations and storage purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Love the brake
customer_reviews.text: Love the brake, thumb reset button features. Lite weight. Storage bag great except that the bag seems to have been tucked in some corner for a little while(dirty)
customer_reviews.author: a p

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice, but go slow on rough surfaces.
customer_reviews.text: Counter tends to jam on a rough surface unless you go pretty slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worth the extra money compared to the $79 keson wheels that last 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift and the person that received it was very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. This was a gift and the person that received it was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the plastic hinge broke after 3 months of ownership rendering it useless.
customer_reviews.text: Although I was impressed upon purchasing this wheel at first ....the plastic hinge broke after 3 months of ownership rendering it useless.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Yanoff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far real good. I have used it about 10 times and have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Dump the 100' Tape Measure and Buy One of These
customer_reviews.text: The Wheel Master Pro has already saved me so much time, right out of the box! Hours spent measuring building layout with a 100' tape measure that takes two people. Now I'm no longer hesitant about changing my mind on the location. I just wheel over and start again. I should have bought one of these years ago. Having a Wheel Master Pro for measuring property layout is like using an air nailer instead of a hammer!
customer_reviews.author: TNod

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price and even better than the ones sold at Home Depot or Lowes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He loves it. He loves that he does not need to take the measuring tape out, have it snap back at him, or having to constantly bend at the hips or knees to get that accurate measurement. It is compact and convenient and accurate. It allows him to make use of his time efficiently when estimating projects at the sites. Worth the price and even better than the ones sold at Home Depot or Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best wheel I've used so far!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wheel I've used so far. I use it everyday in the great AZ Terrain. So far everything has lasted and worked well. It is 100% accurate. This retails at contractor stores for $200+ dollars. Can't beat Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: He said it is much better than the one he had gotten (that I didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my husband who uses it for measuring between trees when planting, measuring distances for his permaculture business. He said it is much better than the one he had gotten (that I didn't know about!)
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Marj

customer_reviews.title: and they are great! Love the mud flap
customer_reviews.text: Our agility club replaced our first ones with these, and they are great! Love the mud flap, and the reset button on the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. Clark

customer_reviews.title: I DIDNT GET MY BAG
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the free carrying case that was suppose to come with this product. I am not happy.
customer_reviews.author: george  bryce

customer_reviews.title: Not a good wheel
customer_reviews.text: Not a good wheel if it bounces a little bit the counter will reset or move
customer_reviews.author: Paul Chaney

product_meta.title: Calculated Industries 6540 Wheel Master Pro 12 Commercial Grade Feet-Inch Distance Measuring Wheel; + FREE Carrying Pack
product_meta.description:
The Rugged New Wheel Master Pro 12 is Designed for Use in Harsh Working Conditions

 * COMMERCIAL GRADE -- Great for contractors, estimators, engineers, landscapers, paving contractors, utility personnel, surveyors, police works, facility engineers, telecommunications contractors; fencing, flooring and janitorial specialists; appraisers and real estate pros.
 * DESIGNED FOR PROFESSIONALS -- The Wheel Master Pro 12's balanced center-line design reduces fatigue and is easier to keep on a straight line especially on rough surfaces. Large display is placed above the wheel for quick reading in feet-inches up to 9999 feet - 11 inches. The counter can be easily reset with your thumb atop the ergonomically designed pistol grip, or by using your foot down at the counter. A steel flip-down kickstand conveniently holds the wheel in place while you take notes. When finished measuring, the sturdy handle unlocks and folds in half to a compact 19" height for compact storage. An integrated carrying handle with rubber grip provides an easy and comfortable way to carry. A 3-inch reflective panel at top of shaft increases user visibility and safety in low light situations.
 * WELL PROTECTED - the Wheel Master Pro 12 is now being offered with a Free durable zippered carrying backpack, as well as a full Two-Year Limited Warranty.

Well-built and ergonomically designed, it is a site measuring tool that will give you accurate results that you can count on for years to come.

Click Add to Cart to get the new Wheel Master Pro 12 measuring wheel today!
feature_bullets: Measures up to 9,999 feet, 11 inches with 99.7% accuracy (+/- 1" in 30')
Easy to use walking linear measurement tool, accurate and reliable - comes with 2-year warranty and Free Carrying Pack
Hand brake on pistol grip for precise measuring; sealed, gear-driven transmission for durability, handy kickstand supports wheel
Re-set the easy reading center-mounted counter from top grip handle or counter unit while rolling, walking or stationary
Heavy duty 12.5 inch diameter wheel smooths rough terrain; collapsible handle folds to compact size (from 38" to 19") for easy storage and portability

specifications.Included Components: Folding measuring wheel, carrying case backpack
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars173 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
